reference.title: Differential Lubrication Specifications
reference.shortdesc: Specifications for proper lubrication levels and maintenance intervals of the differential housing.

section.title: Lubrication Capacity
section.p: The differential housing should not exceed one-third full capacity of grease.

section.title: Fluid Level
section.p: When using fluid grease, maintain the level approximately one and one-half inches below the oil hole.

section.title: Maintenance Interval
section.p: Remove the oil plug every 1000 miles to check grease levels. Add more grease if necessary.

section.title: Factory Specifications
section.p: The differential comes pre-lubricated from the factory with the required amount of lubricant.
